item.description:
Create something unique with everyday items. In this class you will display your jewelry in a unique and eco-friendly way with this original "Bottle Branch Jewelry Holder" or vase or candle stick ... your choice.

You will collage a recycled wine bottle (or any glass bottle) using various papers and recycled materials. You can hang your rings, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets from the branches and the mouth of the bottle! The branch can be removed any time and replaced with fresh flowers.

Wine, Bottles, branches, papers and glues will be provided. You can bring any 2-D materials you would like to incorporate into the decoupage design and their are additional paper options for purchase.

Date: Thursday, August 13 at 6:30pm
Duration: 1.5 Hours
Fee: $35, includes materials

You must be 21 or older to attend. Be sure to contact Abeille at 617.232.4343 to register.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Girls Night - Decoupage Bottle and Branch Jewelry Holder
